content: Four stars, only because there are a couple places you can get stuck and have to start over. In chapter one, if you refill the bucket with water, there's no way to empty it, and in chapter two, you can accidentally use your one and only fuse in the wrong machine. Otherwise great puzzle game.

Wish it was longer. As a kid I was a huge fan of the Longest Journey games, and this game brought back all the nostalgia. Minus the üêç üê¶ üêü puzzle, it was an absolute delight. Very immersive, great side kick and engaging puzzles.
replyContent: Hello, Jessica Johnson. Thanks for your rating and support all along! We will keep working to provide a good user experience. You can follow us on Facebook and Twitter for the latest updates and releases on our games! All the best, Anastasia at Antler Interactive.

content: I have been waiting for this. The gameplay is just like the last, and the puzzles are the same perfect balance of difficulty and do-ability. The storyline had me lost at first, but all was revealed. And the best part--YOU GET A PET!!! Shame you have to dish out so much for only 3 chapters, but it's definitely a pay-worthy game.
replyContent:
Hi, and many thanks for the 5-star review and excellent feedback. We appreciate it. We love Skrii too :)
We¬¥re looking forward to telling you about our next project in the upcoming months! Best regards, Anastasia at Antler Interactive

content: One of the best point and click adventures I've played on mobile. Solid plot, good puzzles, no ridiculous leaps of logic.

content: This game was just as good as the first one. Saying that though you have made a beautiful game and made me want to keep playing and the puzzles were a pain in my a** that's why this is such an amazing game but because it wouldn't let me get my last relic it is a 9¬Ω/10.

content: Visually beautiful just like the first one. The characters, dialog, and story brought life to the world. As others have said the difficulty felt reduced, likely a result of devoting resources to the story. Nitpicks: Holes in the maps visible when you move the camera to its edges. Lots of geometry/pathing issues where Nova/Skrii just walk through solid objects. Looking forward to the next installment/project!
replyContent: Hi and many thanks for the 5-star review and great feedback, we really appreciate it. We¬¥re looking forward to telling you about our next project in the upcoming months. Best regards, Lenny at Antler Interactive

content: It's a good game. Cool graphics, fairly good controls. 5 or 6 bucks is a bit excessive for this offering. Fairly short for that price, and needs a better hint system. Had to use an online forum to exit a level, lose a star. That being said, on a larger phone (using pixel 4a) or specifically a tablet, think this would be much better!

content: A nice sequel and good game itself. Presence of main character makes gameplay a bit more immersive and NPCs improve plot advancement. Second, it seems like there might be another ending, but if you want to find it out you have to play the whole game again. Also there are some bugs and glitches
Great quality and the fps is good the game is working well without

content: This is a really nice puzzle game.The puzzles have a good challenge level for me and the graphics and music are awesome. Overall, a good challenge for a good price if you like puzzle games and point-and-c
